title.narrative: 2020 Project - Skilling young people for entrepreneurship and dignified employment

description.narrative: Empower 70,000 young women and men, including refugee and physically disabled youth, to access dignified and fulfilling work through skills development and linkages to supportive networks and services. To achieve impact at scale, URDT-1 will partner with four other Vocational Training Institutions (VTIs) in the target region to skill youth in agriculture, construction and toursism over the 5-year project period.

participating-org.narrative: Uganda Rural Development and Training Institute
